text: March 19, 2018 / 5:08 PM / Updated 16 minutes ago BRIEF-Shimamura's Group Operating Profit Likely Fell About 10 Pct - Nikkei Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 19 (Reuters) - Nikkei: * SHIMAMURAâ€™S GROUP OPERATING PROFIT LIKELY FELL 10 PERCENT ON THE YEAR TO ABOUT 44 BILLION YEN FOR THE YEAR ENDED FEBRUARY - NIKKEI * SHIMAMURA'S SALES FOR THE YEAR ENDED FEBRUARY ARE SEEN ROUGHLY FLAT AT AROUND 567 BILLION YEN - NIKKEI Source text : ( s.nikkei.com/2DEaBsj ) Further company coverage:
